body:
Hello everyone!

I am currently in the need of a custom made YouTube intro for my videos.

I use Sony Vegas Pro 12 to edit my videos, so if possible, I'd like the final file to be either an MP4 file, or any file that is compatible with Sony Vegas Pro 12.

The reason why I'm looking for a new (and hopefully permanent) intro, is because the one that I currently have does not fill the whole screen, but I would like one to actually cover everything.

Thanks for reading!

-Porky
body_tagged:

title: Looking For A Custom YouTube Intro!
